item.title: Prince Andrew stripped of his 'prince' title, per Buckingham Palace
item.description: Andrew, the son of the late Queen Elizabeth II, will now be known as Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor.

item.title: WATCH: 'A lot of questions being raised' after Trump orders nuclear weapons testing

item.title: Americans concerned about shutdown, more blame GOP and Trump than Democrats: Poll
item.description: Nearly half say Trump and GOP are responsible for the shutdown, the poll finds.

item.title: WATCH: Former Illinois deputy found guilty in Sonya Massey murder
item.description: Sean Grayson was on trial for fatally shooting Sonya Massey in her home.

item.title: 5 more suspects arrested over Louvre jewel heist
